messages.title: BEWARE
messages.content: Brown is growing more desperate by the day...

messages.title: Beware of Labour’s lies and smears
messages.content: Only last year Gordon Brown’s own spin doctor was forced to quit after his plans for an election smear campaign became public. With Labour more desperate than ever, voters are on their guard for more Labour lies and smears. People won’t be fooled by these dodgy Labour tactics. It shows how ashamed Labour must be of their thirteen year record if that’s the best they can do. Remember the choice in many parts of Wales is between the Liberal Democrats and Labour. Only the Liberal Democrats will deliver real change and a fairer Wales.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Remember the choice in many parts of Wales is between the Liberal Democrats and Labour.

quotes.text: Only last year Gordon Brown’s own spin doctor was forced to quit after his plans for an election smear campaign became public.
The Prime Minister’s personal spin doctor Damian McBride quit after it emerged he...conspired to spread false and sinister stories of a highly personal nature.
Damian McBride was part of a wider dirty tricks team at the heart of Downing Street

images.caption: Picture of Gordon Brown with his head in his hand
